code: class  Solution  {   public :     int  distributeCandies ( int  n ,  int  limit )  {   const  int  limitPlusOne  =  limit  +  1 ;   const  int  oneChildExceedsLimit  =  ways ( n  -  limitPlusOne );   const  int  twoChildrenExceedLimit  =  ways ( n  -  2  *  limitPlusOne );   const  int  threeChildrenExceedLimit  =  ways ( n  -  3  *  limitPlusOne );     return  ways ( n )  -  3  *  oneChildExceedsLimit  +  3  *  twoChildrenExceedLimit  -   threeChildrenExceedLimit ;   }   private :     int  ways ( int  n )  {   if  ( n  <  0 )   return  0 ;         return  nCk ( n  +  2 ,  2 );   }   int  nCk ( int  n ,  int  k )  {   int  res  =  1 ;   for  ( int  i  =  1 ;  i  <=  k ;  ++ i )   res  =  res  *  ( n  -  i  +  1 )  /  i ;   return  res ;   }  };
